code: import axios from'axios';const OPENAI_API_KEY=process.env.REACT_APP_OPENAI_API_KEY;const openaiService={async generateLetter(prompt){try{const response=await axios.post('https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions',{model:'gpt-4o-mini',messages:[{role:'user',content:prompt}],max_tokens:500},{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':`Bearer ${OPENAI_API_KEY}`}});return response.data.choices[0].message.content.trim();}catch(error){console.error('Error generating letter:',error);return'Sorry, there was an error generating the letter.';}}};export default openaiService;
